description.en: This mod adds a sponsors for your farm, every day in the morning you have the chance to win a sponsorship of AgroSponsors and its partners to purchase equipment and tools.
description.de: This mod adds a sponsors for your farm, every day in the morning you have the chance to win a sponsorship of AgroSponsors and its partners to purchase equipment and tools.
description.br: Este mod adiciona patrocionadores para a sua fazenda, Todo dia de manha vocÃª tem a chance de ganhar um patrocinio da AgroSponsors e Parceiros para a compra de equipamentos e ferramentas novas!
